text_block_list.text:
――The last day of summer training camp. There were 
no problems and everything ended without issue.

……Right, just like usual. 
Without once showing my depressed face.

Back on that day, when I helped someone in a back alley…… 
most likely, that person was a pickpocket.

The day after, I went back to that same alley but nobody 
was there. I wasn't really worried about the money, but I 
just really wanted to get back what was in the wallet――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That was quite the big sigh……is something wrong? 
Or perhaps, is there something troubling you……?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Good work during the training camp. 
But that sigh……it's not because you're exhausted, right?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
If there's a reason for your gloominess, 
would you mind telling me? I want to help you.

……There was no way I could tell her 『My wallet was taken』. 
How could I get through this without worrying her――?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
『I don't have anyone to go to the festival with』 huh…… 
that was unexpected. Trainer-san, I would have thought 
you would have a number of friends.

I felt kind of pathetic…… 
it felt wrong to deceive her like that.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……I just happened to have some free time, so I'm thankful. 
It's been a while since I've been to a festival.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
A shooting gallery, lottery……Oh, there's also some unusual 
things too. Is that a stall? ……No, maybe an attraction?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
『Mountain Labyrinth』…… Enter the maze in the 
mountains, and the first one to the goal wins, it says.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
You're right. It's a bit small, but just being in the 
mountains should add to the thrill. ……Let's go take a look.

Since Dream Journey was going to be tagging along, 
then we should enjoy it to the fullest.

If we're playing just to win, it might be fun for Dream Journey. 
With that in mind, I made a suggestion. For whoever loses――
choice_data_list: The loser has to listen to one request

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
(……listen to one request, is it? 
I didn't think they'd make such a risky proposal)

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: (Ah, see? The goal is right in front of me already)

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
(……it's someone that's that honest after all. They 
wouldn't do anything underhanded to alter the results)

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
(No matter what the request, they would endeavor 
to grant it. Even if it were the request of the 
person that they should be most wary about……)

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
(They are working desperately to understand me, probably 
trying to figure out my true intentions through that request)

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……the more important it is that something not be lost, the more delicate it is.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
And the more essential the object, the more 
likely it will be shrouded in that scent.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
If something were to happen, I couldn't bear 
to watch. It hurts your heart……doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: This feeling……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ――Wouldn't you say that you agree?

text_block_list.name: Pickpocket
text_block_list.text: W-what's with you……!?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Malice is something that has a distinct scent. 
……Yes, truly, it's quite the troubling thing, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Flies tend to swarm all over it, don't they?
(Rustle……)

Although I hit several dead ends, I finally reached 
the goal. There was no one around. Does that mean――

As I was about to reach the goal, I stopped. 
……Was Dream Journey okay?

Although the path was well maintained, it was still 
in the mountains. I didn't want to leave her behind――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
It seems like you made it here first. 
Splendid, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I was a few steps too slow……how unfortunate. As the loser, 
I suppose I'll have to listen to the request of the winner.
I breathed a sigh of a relief at the sight of Dream Journey.
choice_data_list: I haven't made it yet, so it's a tie
I haven't made it yet, so it's a tie

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……Fufu. Then all bets are off. 
It's unfortunate that I don't get to hear your wish.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……Oh, I almost forgot.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, there was something I wanted to give you. 
I couldn't find the right timing until today.
The thing that Dream Journey gave me――it was――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Yes. It's Trainer-san's, right?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I picked it up back in that alleyway. 
……just to make sure, could you check inside?

……I was surprised. I didn't remember the exact amount 
that was in it, but it seemed to all be there. Besides, 
the thing I wanted most was still there――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Oh. That's……isn't that part of the plan that I wrote up? 
You put that in your wallet?

So that I could go to become a partner she could trust. So I 
wouldn't forget my original purpose, and never stop trying.

The proof of my resolve to be Dream Journey's trainer…… 
Would it be an exaggeration to call it that?
choice_data_list: Well, it's more like a charm though

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……Is that so? Looking back at it now, it seems a bit 
inept, but Trainer-san still sees some value in it?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: As I thought, you're a wonderful trainer.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I truly believe that. 
……please don't change that about yourself.
『I picked it up back in that alleyway』

I couldn't easily accept that as being the truth. 
But for now, let's not think too deeply about it.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……the stars are bright. It's quite a nice evening.

And her words 『Don't change』 could mean 『Remain 
easy to handle』, but no matter what her true 
intentions were behind those words――

It was probably naive, but I thought our current 
relationship probably wasn't a bad one. At least until 
the day comes where we can truly trust each other.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry about it. 
You are my trainer, after all.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Now……and always.
